review.title: “The best place to work and grow”
review.pros: Pros – There's a lot of work to do, and you are always learning something new. If you are a IT professional you will love it here!
review.cons: Cons – The documentation process can be sometimes time consuming, it is necessary though. Some misunderstandings between colleagues can sometimes make your work a little bit harder, but nothing that cannot be resolved.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
